headline: ISLAND INCREASE: SOUTHWEST TO SERVE ST. THOMAS,  U.S. VIRGIN ISLANDS, BEGINNING IN EARLY 2026
summary: Southwest Airlines Co. (NYSE: LUV) intends to grow its network in 2026 initially with new service at Cyril E. King International Airport (STT) on St. Thomas, adding the U.S. Virgin Islands to the carrier's tropical destinations in the Caribbean. Service is expected to begin in early 2026* and will be available for purchase soon.
